reason: Natural question about whether teachers can lecture at hagwons. Answer well-structured with legal basis (학원법 제3조), forbidden activities, and exception (검인정 교과서). Sources confirmed on pages 283 (lines 46-50) and 284 (line 15). No hallucination.
DUPLICATE_ANSWER with q_4_0423. Nearly identical question ('교원이 사교육업체에서 강의할 수 있나요?' vs '교사가 학원에서 강의할 수 있나요?') covering the same topic with overlapping answer content from the same source page.
Natural question about who the 사교육업체 겸직 가이드라인 applies to. Source text confirmed on page 283 line 15. Answer covers 적용대상, 목적, 적용범위, 세부기준 -- all accurately from page 283 lines 13-19. No hallucination.

Natural question about scope of 사교육업체. Source text confirmed on page 283 line 36. Answer covers 범위, 학원 구분, 금지 업무, and inclusion of unregistered entities -- all accurately from page 283 lines 36-50. No hallucination.

TEMPLATE_QUESTION: includes literal section marker '□ 국가공무원법령 규정에 따른 원칙' as a noun phrase. '어떤 경우에 □ 국가공무원법령 규정에 따른 원칙이 가능한가요?' is unnatural -- a regulatory principle cannot be 'possible'. Source text accurate but question is meaningless.

DUPLICATE_ANSWER: identical source text dump shared with q_4_0445, q_4_0446, q_4_0448, q_4_0451 (5 entries with same answer). Answer is a raw copy of page 283 lines 36-50. Question phrasing '사교육업체의 범위 및 업무에 해당하려면' treats a section title as a condition to fulfill.
DUPLICATE_ANSWER with q_4_0444 and others. Also TEMPLATE_QUESTION: '사교육업체의 범위 및 업무를 하려면 어떤 요건이 필요한가요?' is nonsensical -- one cannot 'do' a scope-and-duties section heading.
DUPLICATE_ANSWER with q_4_0444/q_4_0445/q_4_0448/q_4_0451. Identical answer text. Question itself is reasonable ('어떤 것들이 포함되나요?') but batch contains 5 copies of the same answer.
DUPLICATE_ANSWER with q_4_0444/q_4_0445/q_4_0446/q_4_0451. Identical answer text. Question is reasonable but redundant within batch.

DUPLICATE_ANSWER with q_4_0444 series. Also TEMPLATE_QUESTION: '어떤 경우에 학원의 설립·운영 및 과외교습에 관한 법률(이하 학원법)가 가능한가요?' is nonsensical -- a law cannot be 'possible'. Full legal citation used as noun phrase in template.
